Detailed Description

A class to manage reconstructed cluster in AMS Tracker.

AMSTrCluster is the a core of the Tracker reconstruction. New ladder geometry (TKDBc) and calibration databases (TrCalDB) and strip database (TkStrip) are used instead of the original TKDBc, TrIdSoft, and TrIdGeom.

Date:
2007/12/03 SH First import (just a copy of trrec.C in Gbatch)

2008/01/14 SH First stable vertion after a refinement

2008/01/20 SH Imported to tkdev (test version)

2008/02/13 SH _signal array is changed as vector

2008/02/16 AO New data format

2008/02/19 AO Signal corrections

2008/02/26 AO Eta based local coordinate (see TkCoo.h)

2008/03/01 AO Added member _seedind

2008/03/06 AO Changing some data members and methods

2008/03/31 AO Eta and CofG methods changing

2008/04/11 AO XEta and XCofG coordinate based on TkCoo

2008/06/19 AO Using TrCalDB instead of data members

Date
2008/11/06 18:35:51

Revision
1.39
